snippet: The V.A. released key findings of a recently completed study examining the death records of more than 55 million veterans from 1979 to 2014 from every state....
abstract: Dept of Veterans Affairs releases study showing suicide rate among veterans has risen 35 percent since 2001; sharpest increases are among those who have served since 2001 and women, whose suicide rates have increased 85 percent.
lead_paragraph: The V.A. released key findings of a recently completed study examining the death records of more than 55 million veterans from 1979 to 2014 from every state.

headline.main: Suicide Rate Among Veterans Has Risen Sharply Since 2001
headline.print_headline: Suicide Rate Among Veterans Has Risen Sharply Since 2001

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
